title: People's Pint
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A bar/restaurant that makes its own beer and serves in-house-made food. Sources local alcohol and produce. All beer is vegan, and a vegan and separate gluten-free menu are available. Vegan offerings include a rice and bean burrito, peanut noodles, baked tofu with peanut sauce, and salads with in-house-made vegan dressings such as lemon tahini & sesame ginger.
